2011.name: July 8-10 -- Westmoreland State Park
2011.description: Another wonderful camping weekend despite some hot weather.  Breakfast at Joe & Minnie's, hiking and bike trails, swimming pool,  a great potluck BBQ and a private Sunday service at the campsite.
